name: s3deletebucket
description: deletes a bucket, this function is deprecated, use instead S3Delete.

params.name: bucketName
params.description: Name of the bucket to list objects from.

params.name: force
params.description: Also delete bucket if it has content.

params.name: accessKeyId
params.description: S3 accessKeyId, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.accesskeyid].

params.name: secretAccessKey
params.description: S3 secretAccessKey, if not defined it checks the system property/environment variable for [lucee.s3.secretaccesskey].

params.name: host
params.description: the provider to connect, if not set Amazon AWS is used.
